00043 class mat33 {
00044 public:
00045         idScalar& operator()(int i, int j) { return m_data[3 * i + j]; }
00046         const idScalar& operator()(int i, int j) const { return m_data[3 * i + j]; }
00047         const mat33& operator=(const mat33& rhs);
00048         mat33 transpose() const;
00049         const mat33& operator+=(const mat33& b);
00050         const mat33& operator-=(const mat33& b);
00051 
00052         friend mat33 operator*(const mat33& a, const mat33& b);
00053         friend vec3 operator*(const mat33& a, const vec3& b);
00054         friend mat33 operator*(const mat33& a, const idScalar& s);
00055         friend mat33 operator*(const idScalar& s, const mat33& a);
00056         friend mat33 operator+(const mat33& a, const mat33& b);
00057         friend mat33 operator-(const mat33& a, const mat33& b);
00058         friend mat33 operator/(const mat33& a, const idScalar& s);
00059 
00060 private:
00061         // layout is [0,1,2;3,4,5;6,7,8]
00062         idScalar m_data[9];
00063 };

00088 class matxx {
00089 public:
00090     matxx() {
00091         m_data = 0x0;
00092         m_cols=0;
00093         m_rows=0;
00094     }
00095         matxx(int rows, int cols) : m_rows(rows), m_cols(cols) {
00096                 m_data = static_cast<idScalar*>(idMalloc(sizeof(idScalar) * rows * cols));
00097         }
00098         ~matxx() { idFree(m_data); }
00099         idScalar& operator()(int row, int col) { return m_data[row * m_cols + col]; }
00100         const idScalar& operator()(int row, int col) const { return m_data[row * m_cols + col]; }
00101         const int& rows() const { return m_rows; }
00102         const int& cols() const { return m_cols; }
00103 
00104 private:
00105         int m_rows;
00106         int m_cols;
00107         idScalar* m_data;
00108 };

00110 class mat3x {
00111 public:
00112     mat3x() {
00113         m_data = 0x0;
00114         m_cols=0;
00115     }
00116     mat3x(const mat3x&rhs) {
00117         m_cols=rhs.m_cols;
00118         allocate();
00119         *this = rhs;
00120     }
00121     mat3x(int rows, int cols): m_cols(cols) {
00122         allocate();
00123     };
00124     void operator=(const mat3x& rhs) {
00125         if (m_cols != rhs.m_cols) {
00126             error_message("size missmatch, cols= %d but rhs.cols= %d\n", cols(), rhs.cols());
00127             abort();
00128         }
00129         for(int i=0;i<3*m_cols;i++) {
00130             m_data[i] = rhs.m_data[i];
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     ~mat3x() {
00135         free();
00136     }
00137     idScalar& operator()(int row, int col) { return m_data[row * m_cols + col]; }
00138     const idScalar& operator()(int row, int col) const { return m_data[row * m_cols + col]; }
00139     int rows() const { return m_rows; }
00140     const int& cols() const { return m_cols; }
00141     void resize(int rows, int cols) {
00142         m_cols=cols;
00143         free();
00144         allocate();
00145     }
00146     void setZero() {
00147         memset(m_data,0x0,sizeof(idScalar)*m_rows*m_cols);
00148     }
00149     // avoid operators that would allocate -- use functions sub/add/mul in IDMath.hpp instead
00150 private:
00151     void allocate(){m_data = static_cast<idScalar*>(idMalloc(sizeof(idScalar) * m_rows * m_cols));}
00152     void free() { idFree(m_data);}
00153     enum {m_rows=3};
00154     int m_cols;
00155     idScalar* m_data;
00156 };

00158 inline void resize(mat3x &m, idArrayIdx size) {
00159     m.resize(3, size);
00160     m.setZero();
00161 }

00165 inline const vec3& vec3::operator=(const vec3& rhs) {
00166         if (&rhs != this) {
00167                 memcpy(m_data, rhs.m_data, 3 * sizeof(idScalar));
00168         }
00169         return *this;
00170 }

00172 inline vec3 vec3::cross(const vec3& b) const {
00173         vec3 result;
00174         result.m_data[0] = m_data[1] * b.m_data[2] - m_data[2] * b.m_data[1];
00175         result.m_data[1] = m_data[2] * b.m_data[0] - m_data[0] * b.m_data[2];
00176         result.m_data[2] = m_data[0] * b.m_data[1] - m_data[1] * b.m_data[0];
00177 
00178         return result;
00179 }
00180 
00181 inline idScalar vec3::dot(const vec3& b) const {
00182         return m_data[0] * b.m_data[0] + m_data[1] * b.m_data[1] + m_data[2] * b.m_data[2];
00183 }

00185 inline const mat33& mat33::operator=(const mat33& rhs) {
00186         if (&rhs != this) {
00187                 memcpy(m_data, rhs.m_data, 9 * sizeof(idScalar));
00188         }
00189         return *this;
00190 }
00191 inline mat33 mat33::transpose() const {
00192         mat33 result;
00193         result.m_data[0] = m_data[0];
00194         result.m_data[1] = m_data[3];
00195         result.m_data[2] = m_data[6];
00196         result.m_data[3] = m_data[1];
00197         result.m_data[4] = m_data[4];
00198         result.m_data[5] = m_data[7];
00199         result.m_data[6] = m_data[2];
00200         result.m_data[7] = m_data[5];
00201         result.m_data[8] = m_data[8];
00202 
00203         return result;
00204 }

00206 inline mat33 operator*(const mat33& a, const mat33& b) {
00207         mat33 result;
00208         result.m_data[0] =
00209                 a.m_data[0] * b.m_data[0] + a.m_data[1] * b.m_data[3] + a.m_data[2] * b.m_data[6];
00210         result.m_data[1] =
00211                 a.m_data[0] * b.m_data[1] + a.m_data[1] * b.m_data[4] + a.m_data[2] * b.m_data[7];
00212         result.m_data[2] =
00213                 a.m_data[0] * b.m_data[2] + a.m_data[1] * b.m_data[5] + a.m_data[2] * b.m_data[8];
00214         result.m_data[3] =
00215                 a.m_data[3] * b.m_data[0] + a.m_data[4] * b.m_data[3] + a.m_data[5] * b.m_data[6];
00216         result.m_data[4] =
00217                 a.m_data[3] * b.m_data[1] + a.m_data[4] * b.m_data[4] + a.m_data[5] * b.m_data[7];
00218         result.m_data[5] =
00219                 a.m_data[3] * b.m_data[2] + a.m_data[4] * b.m_data[5] + a.m_data[5] * b.m_data[8];
00220         result.m_data[6] =
00221                 a.m_data[6] * b.m_data[0] + a.m_data[7] * b.m_data[3] + a.m_data[8] * b.m_data[6];
00222         result.m_data[7] =
00223                 a.m_data[6] * b.m_data[1] + a.m_data[7] * b.m_data[4] + a.m_data[8] * b.m_data[7];
00224         result.m_data[8] =
00225                 a.m_data[6] * b.m_data[2] + a.m_data[7] * b.m_data[5] + a.m_data[8] * b.m_data[8];
00226 
00227         return result;
00228 }

00245 inline vec3 operator*(const mat33& a, const vec3& b) {
00246         vec3 result;
00247 
00248         result.m_data[0] =
00249                 a.m_data[0] * b.m_data[0] + a.m_data[1] * b.m_data[1] + a.m_data[2] * b.m_data[2];
00250         result.m_data[1] =
00251                 a.m_data[3] * b.m_data[0] + a.m_data[4] * b.m_data[1] + a.m_data[5] * b.m_data[2];
00252         result.m_data[2] =
00253                 a.m_data[6] * b.m_data[0] + a.m_data[7] * b.m_data[1] + a.m_data[8] * b.m_data[2];
00254 
00255         return result;

00337 inline const vecx& vecx::operator=(const vecx& rhs) {
00338         if (size() != rhs.size()) {
00339                 error_message("size missmatch, size()= %d but rhs.size()= %d\n", size(), rhs.size());
00340                 abort();
00341         }
00342         if (&rhs != this) {
00343                 memcpy(m_data, rhs.m_data, rhs.size() * sizeof(idScalar));
00344         }
00345         return *this;
00346 }
00347 inline vecx operator*(const vecx& a, const idScalar& s) {
00348         vecx result(a.size());
00349         for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); i++) {
00350                 result.m_data[i] = a.m_data[i] * s;
00351         }
00352         return result;
00353 }
00354 inline vecx operator*(const idScalar& s, const vecx& a) { return a * s; }
00355 inline vecx operator+(const vecx& a, const vecx& b) {
00356         vecx result(a.size());
00357         // TODO: error handling for a.size() != b.size()??
00358         if (a.size() != b.size()) {
00359                 error_message("size missmatch. a.size()= %d, b.size()= %d\n", a.size(), b.size());
00360                 abort();
00361         }
00362         for (int i = 0; i < a.size(); i++) {
00363                 result.m_data[i] = a.m_data[i] + b.m_data[i];
00364         }
00365 
00366         return result;
00367 }
00368 inline vecx operator-(const vecx& a, const vecx& b) {
00369         vecx result(a.size());
00370         // TODO: error handling for a.size() != b.size()??
00371         if (a.size() != b.size()) {
00372                 error_message("size missmatch. a.size()= %d, b.size()= %d\n", a.size(), b.size());
00373                 abort();
00374         }
00375         for (int i = 0; i < a.size(); i++) {
00376                 result.m_data[i] = a.m_data[i] - b.m_data[i];
00377         }
00378         return result;
00379 }
00380 inline vecx operator/(const vecx& a, const idScalar& s) {
00381         vecx result(a.size());
00382         for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); i++) {
00383                 result.m_data[i] = a.m_data[i] / s;
00384         }
00385 
00386         return result;

00389 inline vec3 operator*(const mat3x& a, const vecx& b) {
00390     vec3 result;
00391     if (a.cols() != b.size()) {
00392         error_message("size missmatch. a.cols()= %d, b.size()= %d\n", a.cols(), b.size());
00393         abort();
00394     }
00395     result(0)=0.0;
00396     result(1)=0.0;
00397     result(2)=0.0;
00398     for(int i=0;i<b.size();i++) {
00399         for(int k=0;k<3;k++) {
00400             result(k)+=a(k,i)*b(i);
00401         }
00402     }
00403     return result;
00404 }
